text: Kovalyovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Leninsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 81 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 31 km from Yermolayevo, 4 km from Bugulchan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Kovalyovka
